thread.title: Coronation Street spoilers: Will unlucky in love Eileen's wedding go off without a hitch?
thread.title_full: Coronation Street spoilers: Will unlucky in love Eileen's wedding go off without a hitch?

author: Jennifer Rodger
title: Coronation Street spoilers: Will unlucky in love Eileen's wedding go off without a hitch?
text:
Andy torches the garage then Phelan grabs him (Photo: ITV) Share Get soaps updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Someone order a taxi for Eileen pronto before she ends up married to vile Phelan. 
As she prepares for her low-key wedding, Pat ropes in Andy to torch the garage to destroy CCTV evidence of his building scam confession. It pushes Andy into a confrontation with Phelan, and only one of them is a winner. 
Meanwhile, Steph is at the airport waiting for Andy to flee the country while Eileen is at the register office. Who will get their man? Interview Sue Cleaver plays Eileen Grimshaw (Photo: ITV) 
As Eileen wants to marry Phelan, Sue Cleaver, who plays her, tells us more... 
How is Sue feeling waiting for Phelan at the register office? 
Everything always goes wrong for Eileen where relationships are concerned so she starts to worry. 
How does it feel having your first Corrie wedding? 
Well, it wasn’t exactly the wedding of the year! It was pretty low-key and nobody was there but it was nice getting the bouquet to take home. 
How does Phelan compare to her previous love interests? 
Phelan is definitely the stayer. She loved Paul, the fireman, but his job terrified her and he wouldn’t give it up so he had to go. 
What have the fans been saying to you about the couple? 
They don’t like it! They all ask what Eileen is doing with Phelan when he is such a bad man, which is great! 
Do you think Phelan has genuine feelings for Eileen? 
Yes, I think he does because he has looked after her. He didn’t need to marry her, there is nothing in it for him now the money has gone. He's video nasty Nathan films Bethany (Photo: ITV) 
The new year isn’t going to ring any changes for Bethany. After ending 2016 on a low she is recovering from her overdose. 
And her new friendship with Nathan isn’t going to be a good influence on her fragile mental state. 
Shona visibly recoils at the sight of Nathan at the café so he’s clearly done something to upset her. But Bethany isn’t able to make sound judgements and takes his interest in her at face value. 
When Nathan encourages her to make some YouTube videos of her beauty tutorials, she’s flattered. Then he creepily suggests that next time she wears something that shows off her figure...
